name: Book-Chapter-Verse (Mini-Game 1)
description:
Fall in Love with God's Word...again!

Knowing the Scriptures and meditating on them are vital to the believer's continued spiritual growth and development. Now, there's a fun and exciting game that is revolutionizing the way we learn and locate Scriptures. Book-Chapter-Verse enables you to recall the book, chapter, and verse of those Scriptures every believer should know, without long, boring, rote learning sessions.  In no time, you'll know exactly where to find those verses that you just couldn't put your finger on. Who knew that scripture learning could be a fun and exhilarating exercise for the brain, while nurturing the deepest longing of the soul.
